text: Enrique Múgica Herzog (20 February 1932 — 10 April 2020) was a Spanish lawyer and politician. He was born in San Sebastián, Guipúzcoa, Spain. A critic of Francisco Franco, he spent three years in prison. He was one of the founders of the Spanish Socialist Party (PSOE). He was Justice Minister (1988–1991), former congressman (representing Gipuzkoa; 1977–2000) and former Ombudsman (2000–2010). Sitio Web del Defensor del Pueblo He died on 10 April 2020 from COVID-19 in Barcelona, aged 88.Muere Enrique Múgica, ex ministro de Justicia y Defensor del Pueblo. La Razón, 11 April 2020 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Spanish politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Barcelona
title: Enrique Múgica
